title: Offer for a Local Gig
description: A well-known club in your hometown has offered your star a chance to perform for a small crowd. This could be a good way to earn some extra cash and build a local following.

positive_outcome.message: The show was a hit! Fans loved the intimate setting, and the money helps too.

negative_outcome.message: The gig went poorly with technical issues, and fans seemed unimpressed.

positive_outcome.message: Declining the gig kept your star well-rested, with minimal impact on reputation.

negative_outcome.message: Fans were disappointed by the decline, seeing it as a missed opportunity.

title: Offer to Perform at a Music Festival
description: A big regional music festival has invited your star to perform as an opening act. It’s a huge opportunity for exposure and money, but the demands are high.

positive_outcome.message: The festival performance was a success! New fans and big earnings came rolling in.

negative_outcome.message: Bad weather and sound issues made the festival a stressful experience with mixed reviews.

positive_outcome.message: Skipping the festival helped avoid a potentially risky situation. No major fallout.

negative_outcome.message: The festival was a big hit without your star, leaving fans disappointed and reputation hurt.

title: Prime-Time TV Special
description: A popular TV network is offering a paid prime-time slot for your star to perform live. This could be a massive payday, but also a high-stress opportunity that requires careful planning.

positive_outcome.message: The TV performance was flawless! Ratings soared and fans were thrilled.

negative_outcome.message: Technical issues plagued the performance, making it a challenging night with mixed reviews.

positive_outcome.message: Declining the appearance preserved your star's energy and reputation took only a minor hit.

negative_outcome.message: Declining the appearance disappointed fans and hurt reputation.

title: Tabloid Scandal
description: A tabloid has a story on your star's wild party. They're giving you a chance to respond before it goes live.

positive_outcome.message: The denial was successful, and the story died down quickly.

negative_outcome.message: The denial backfired, as more 'sources' confirmed the story, damaging reputation further.

positive_outcome.message: Ignoring it worked out, and the story lost traction quickly.

negative_outcome.message: Ignoring the story led to rumors spiraling, hurting reputation and adding stress.

positive_outcome.message: The spin worked! Fans saw it as harmless fun, and reputation even got a small boost.

negative_outcome.message: The spin fell flat, and some media outlets criticized the attempt, hurting reputation.

title: Charity Event Invitation
description: Your star is invited to a high-profile charity event. Should they attend?

positive_outcome.message: The charity event was a success! Fans admired your star’s generosity.

negative_outcome.message: The event didn’t go as planned, with few fans noticing and media unimpressed.

positive_outcome.message: Declining had little effect, and your star avoided extra stress.

negative_outcome.message: The decline disappointed fans who expected charity involvement.
